c1.name: Pre-Dinner Dance for Your Taste Buds
c1.descriptionRaw:
When 4 party members are <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color> or <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>, all nearby party members will have their <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> CRIT DMG increased by 60% for 15s after Escoffier uses her Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11122}Low-Temperature Cooking{/LINK}</color> or Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11125}Scoring Cuts{/LINK}</color>.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Inspiration-Immersed Seasoning."
c1.description:
When 4 party members are Hydro or Cryo, all nearby party members will have their Cryo DMG CRIT DMG increased by 60% for 15s after Escoffier uses her Elemental Skill **Low-Temperature Cooking** or Elemental Burst **Scoring Cuts**.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Inspiration-Immersed Seasoning."

c2.name: Fresh, Fragrant Stew Is an Art
c2.descriptionRaw:
When Escoffier activates her Cooking Mek in its {LINK#N11120001}<color=#FFD780FF>Cold Storage Mode</color>{/LINK}, she will gain the "Freshly-Prepped Delicacy" effect for 15s. During this time, Escoffier will gain 5 Cold Dish stacks. When nearby active characters apart from Escoffier deal <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> with a Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attack, or an Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, they will expend 1 Cold Dish stack to increase their DMG dealt by 240% of Escoffier's ATK.
If you hit multiple opponents with a single instance of <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>, Cold Dish stacks will be consumed based on the number of opponents hit.
c2.description:
When Escoffier activates her Cooking Mek in its **Cold Storage Mode**, she will gain the "Freshly-Prepped Delicacy" effect for 15s. During this time, Escoffier will gain 5 Cold Dish stacks. When nearby active characters apart from Escoffier deal Cryo DMG with a Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attack, or an Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, they will expend 1 Cold Dish stack to increase their DMG dealt by 240% of Escoffier's ATK.
If you hit multiple opponents with a single instance of Cryo DMG, Cold Dish stacks will be consumed based on the number of opponents hit.

c3.name: The Bakery Magic of Caramel Browning
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11122}Low-Temperature Cooking{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of **Low-Temperature Cooking** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Secret Rosemary Recipe
c4.descriptionRaw:
{LINK#P1122101}<color=#FFD780FF>Rehab Diet</color>{/LINK} lasts 6 more seconds. While it is active, you have a chance of healing 100% extra HP and restoring 2 Energy to Escoffier when you trigger healing through <color=#FFD780FF>Rehab Diet</color>. This chance corresponds to Escoffier's CRIT Rate. You can trigger this effect 7 times during any one <color=#FFD780FF>Rehab Diet</color>'s duration.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Better to Salivate Than Medicate."
c4.description:
**Rehab Diet** lasts 6 more seconds. While it is active, you have a chance of healing 100% extra HP and restoring 2 Energy to Escoffier when you trigger healing through Rehab Diet. This chance corresponds to Escoffier's CRIT Rate. You can trigger this effect 7 times during any one Rehab Diet's duration.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Better to Salivate Than Medicate."

c5.name: Symphony of a Thousand Sauces
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11125}Scoring Cuts{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of **Scoring Cuts** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Tea Parties Bursting With Color
c6.descriptionRaw:
{LINK#N11120001}<color=#FFD780FF>Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode</color>{/LINK} is enhanced:
· When your party's active character's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents, Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode will fire off another Special-Grade Frosty Parfait, dealing 500% of Escoffier's ATK as <color=#99FFFFFF>AoE Cryo DMG</color>. This DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s, and this effect can be triggered 6 times within the duration of one Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode.
c6.description:
**Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode** is enhanced:
· When your party's active character's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents, Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode will fire off another Special-Grade Frosty Parfait, dealing 500% of Escoffier's ATK as AoE Cryo DMG. This DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s, and this effect can be triggered 6 times within the duration of one Cooking Mek: Cold Storage Mode.
